author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
Please add (at least)
```
[compat]
julia = "1"
```
to your project file and retrigger the bot.

I've created release `v0.1.0`, [here](https://github.com/nlw0/ChipSort.jl/releases/tag/v0.1.0) it is.
<!-- b708f010-96a4-11e9-8efb-b7f361ad5461 -->
